relation: im looking for a manga where the protagonist is a genius not just in one subject but in everything. Something like Liar Game Golden Boy must have somewhat of a romance subplot ________________ Current Favorite:Seishun For-get! Manga That Needs More Attention: S Senjou no Tena
Death Note ES Zennou no Noa - The World of Lostmemories -- dunno if there's any romance since there's only two chapters scanlated Spiral: Suiri no Kizuna
" Hayate no Gotoku!" ? genius in well his own ways... ________________
Lost+Brain - Haven't read it yet, so not sure if romance is involved

SWOT The protagonist is always studying so he might just be a hard worker... This probably isn't what you want since no school work is accually shown, he is fighting deliquents so he can have peace of mind to study... Though there is a romance subplot. ________________ An instant or an eternity. Both are the same, in the passing of an instant lies the beauty of eternity. -Ginen Shounen Because I am a small man, my heart is moved by what's in front of my eyes, not by what the whole world needs. -D.Gray-man
Q.E.D. - he is s genius studied in MIT and came to Japan to continue his high school. Its a detective manga. He know almost everything

Detective Conan. The protagonist, Shinichi/Conan, is extremely intelligent. Spoiler (highlight to view) I found it really funny whenever Ran told Conan about her feelings for Shinichi. xD Shinichi & Conan are the same person...except Conan is the name he uses throughout most of the series because he was drugged...and his body shrank to that of an elementary school kid.
